translations: 使......变残暴，使......丧失人类情感，使......变残忍；虐待，残酷对待（brutalize 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He was brutalized by the experience of being in prison.
sentences.translation: 牢狱生活使他变得残暴了。
卡扎菲残暴统治人民长达42年。

sentences.sentence: Our people are brutalized and killed, and I lost 21 of my family members in one day .
sentences.translation: 我们的人民是摧残和杀害，在一天我失去了我的家人21。
